mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_INIT_DATE, BOARD_VIEWS, WRITER ) VALUES( BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'), 0, #{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT BD.BOARD_SEQ, BD.BOARD_TITLE, BD.BOARD_CONTENT, BD.BOARD_VIEWS, BD.BOARD_INIT_DATE, BD.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, BD.WRITER, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BD.BOARD_SEQ DESC) AS RNUM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_LIKE WHERE BD.BOARD_SEQ = BOARD_SEQ AND USER_ID = #{user_id}) CNT FROM BOARD BD ) B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{firstRecordIndex} AND #{lastRecordIndex} ORDER BY NVL(BOARD_UPDATE_DATE,BOARD_INIT_DATE) DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = #{board_title}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{board_content}, WRITER = #{writer}, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{board_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD_COMMENT WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{board_seq} ORDER BY NVL(UPDATE_DATE,INIT_DATE)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_COMMENT ( BOARD_SEQ, COMMENT_SEQ, CONTENT, WRITER, INIT_DATE ) VALUES( #{board_seq}, COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{content}, #{writer}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') )
INSERT INTO BOARD_LIKE ( USER_ID, BOARD_SEQ, INIT_USER, INIT_DATE ) VALUES( #{user_id}, #{board_seq}, #{user_id}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') )
